item.description:
Hi!

Karma Couture is an upscale consignment store located in quaint downtown East Greenwich. Since it's a small boutique, I am limiting the number of attendees.

This is an invitation only after hours wine and cheese party. Per the invitation, all attendees will receive an additional 20% off of their normal discount!

I will be rsvping for the group. Hope you can join us!
item.name: Girls Night - Wine, Cheese & Shopping!
